 ∙ Does she feel unhappy or cry easily? This indicates post-partum depression, and usually occurs 4-7 days after 
delivery. Assure her that everything will be fine and refer her to the MO only if the problem persists.
 ∙ Are there any other complaints?
B. Examination
 ∙ This is similar to the examination conducted during the first visit. During second and third PNC visit for
